original_title: Kings of Hip Hop: The Founders
overview: Celebrate the enduring legacy of hip-hop with this special reunion concert at New York City's famous Webster Hall, featuring a host of head-bobbing performances from many of rap music's most legendary names. Highlights include "If I Ruled the World" by Kurtis Blow, the Crash Crew's "We Are Known as Emcees" and "Looking for the Perfect Beat" by Afrika Bambaataa and Soul Sonic Force.
title: Kings of Hip Hop: The Founders
